root.text: Severe chest pain/pressure, shortness of breath, nausea, cold sweat?

sofort.text:
⚠️ Suspected heart attack!
1. Call 112 immediately.
2. Sit upright, loosen tight clothing.
3. Reassure and keep warm.
4. No food.
5. If unconscious/no normal breathing → start CPR.

zeichen.text: Warning signs: dull pressure/tightness in chest, radiation to arm/jaw/back, breathlessness, anxiety, sweat, nausea.

unsicher.text: If unsure, call 112 and describe symptoms.

ende.text: No acute suspicion. If symptoms return: act immediately.
